entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning after midnight except periods of wet snow over higher terrain. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Periods of wet snow over higher terrain early in the morning. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
